scripts.upload-assets: wrangler r2 object put waiver-pdfs/assets/index.html --file dist/index.html && wrangler r2 object put waiver-pdfs/assets/assets/index.css --file dist/assets/index.css && wrangler r2 object put waiver-pdfs/assets/assets/index.js --file dist/assets/index.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run upload-assets && wrangler deploy
